title: First Notable Bad Trip
report: I insufflated exactly 50mg at around 1pm, and tripped regularly as I normally would, as I use MXE a lot. Then later on, about 8pm I had another line of 70 mg. Instead of all the normal signs of tripping, I felt numb and cold, with no euphoria or happiness, just tingly all over and it wasn't pleasant.
This 'bad trip' lasted about 2 hours and the effects began to wear off. This was the first noteable bad trip from MXE I've ever had, and I've been using it for about 7 months.

erowid.citation: xET. "First Notable Bad Trip: experience with Methoxetamine (ID 94839)". Erowid.org. Mar 21, 2012. erowid.org/exp/94839
